amendatorysection.catchline: Carbon Sequestration Assessment Cash Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Carbon Sequestration Assessment Cash Fund is created. The fund shall be used to carry out sections 2-5301 to 2-5306. The State Treasurer shall credit to the fund any money appropriated to the fund by the Legislature and any money received as gifts, grants, or other contributions from public or private sources obtained for the purposes of sections 2-5301 to 2-5306. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
